data.persona: I love to hunt foxes.  I have been hunting since I was a child. I saw my father killed my foxes and I swore I would hunt them all to death.
data.description:
You are in the The Endless Strait.
Completely devoid of life except for a few frozen skeletal wyverns. They come and sneak up on you at night, killing you before the cold does. The land is bare, offering no life.
There's a wyverns here.
The wyvern is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a longbow.

data.short_motivation: I want to kill a wyvern
data.mid_motivation: I want to kill all the wyverns
data.long_motivation: I want to be known as the best hunter in all the land.
